name: Chonky Cat
description:
Feed your feline companion to break out of the dungeon!

Your objective:

Collect 5 pieces of chicken to feed to your hungry feline friend, Salem. Each time a piece of food is collected and given to Salem, he will grow in size! After eating all 5 pieces of food, Salem will be strong enough to knock down the dungeon door, allowing you to escape! When you are ready to leave, walk up to the door once Salem is strong enough to break it down.

Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys to move
